kv2.2:1.3: Atthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:1.5: Natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:1.7: Hañci natthi arahato avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:2.1: ☑ Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, atthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:2.3: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, atthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:3.1: ☑ Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, natthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:3.3: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, natthi tassa avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ avijjānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.2:4.3: Arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya, musā bhaṇeyya, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇeyya, pharusaṃ bhaṇeyya, samphaṃ palapeyya, sandhiṃ chindeyya, nillopaṃ hareyya, ekāgāriyaṃ kareyya, paripanthe tiṭṭheyya, paradāraṃ gaccheyya, gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:5.1: ☑ Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, puthujjano aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya, musā bhaṇeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:5.3: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:6.1: ☑ Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, na ca arahā aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:6.3: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, na ca puthujjano aññāṇapakato pāṇaṃ haneyya, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya …pe… gāmaghātaṃ kareyya, nigamaghātaṃ kareyyāti?
kv2.2:7.3: Atthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṃghe aññāṇaṃ, sikkhāya aññāṇaṃ, pubbante aññāṇaṃ, aparante aññāṇaṃ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṃ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:8.1: ☑ Natthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṃghe aññāṇaṃ, sikkhāya aññāṇaṃ, pubbante aññāṇaṃ, aparante aññāṇaṃ, pubbantāparante aññāṇaṃ, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:8.3: Hañci natthi arahato satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṃghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:9.1: ☑ Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, atthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṃghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:9.3: Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, atthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṃghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:10.1: ☑ Atthi arahato aññāṇaṃ, natthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṃghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:10.3: Atthi puthujjanassa aññāṇaṃ, natthi tassa satthari aññāṇaṃ, dhamme aññāṇaṃ, saṃghe aññāṇaṃ …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:11.3: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?
kv2.2:11.5: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:12.5: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti?
kv2.2:12.7: Hañci arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:13.6: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:14.8: Hañci arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:15.7: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:16.2: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi aññāṇaṃ, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi aññāṇanti.
kv2.2:18.1: ☑ Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:18.3: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:19.5: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:20.4: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:21.6: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:23.1: ☑ Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:23.3: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:24.5: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:25.7: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:27.4: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.2:27.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?
kv2.2:27.6: ‘Iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo, iti vedanā …pe…
kv2.2:27.9: iti viññāṇaṃ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti—
kv2.2:27.10: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.2:28.4: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.2:28.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?
kv2.2:28.7: bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti—
kv2.2:28.8: jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti—
kv2.2:28.9: jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti—
kv2.2:28.11: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.2:29.4: “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya, sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
kv2.2:33.4: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
kv2.2:33.5: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—
kv2.2:34.4: Nanu arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṃ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ na jāneyyāti?
kv2.2:34.6: Hañci arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṃ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ na jāneyya, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.2:35.1: ☑ Arahā itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ na jāneyya, maggāmaggaṃ na jāneyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ na jāneyyāti, atthi arahato aññāṇanti?
kv2.2:35.3: Arahā sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaṃ vā na jāneyyāti?
